title: The Soot-Streaked Window
description: A cursed soot is haunting the windows of the Low-District...

turns.narrative: A window in the 'Low-District' is covered in a soot that can't be washed away. It’s forming the shape of a screaming face.
turns.convergence: The soot is warm and smells of old charcoal and wet stone. It feels like velvet and sticks to your tools like a living shadow.

turns.narrative: Looking through the window, the room inside is filled with 'Grey-Mist'. You can see a 'Chimney-Sweep'—a child made of ash—cleaning a fireplace that isn't lit.
turns.convergence: The 'Ash-Child' looks at you with eyes of glowing embers. 'The fire... it went the wrong way,' he whispers.

turns.narrative: The fireplace is actually a 'Small-Rift' to the 'Void-Fringe'. It’s sucking the color and warmth out of the district.
turns.convergence: The fire blazes violet, and the Ash-Child begins to solidify into a 'Soot-Sentry'—a guardian of the hearth.

turns.narrative: The Sentry is trying to 'Sweep' the soot back into the rift. He gives you a 'Cinder-Brush' and asks for your help.
turns.choice_b: Burn the soot with a torch
turns.convergence: The soot chitters and retreats into the rift, leaving a trail of 'Cinder-Dust' on the floor.

turns.narrative: A 'Smoke-Wraith'—a creature of swirling gray vapors—emerges from the chimney, its limbs like long, wispy fingers reaching for your throat.
turns.convergence: The wraith dissolves into a cloud of fragrant white smoke, but the Ash-Child's ember-eyes are fading.

turns.narrative: He needs a 'Fuel-source' to remain in this world. The air is cold and smells of burnt milk and old soot.
turns.convergence: The Ash-Child glows orange and smiles. He gives you a 'Coal-Locket'—it contains a piece of 'Eternal-Spark'.

turns.narrative: The window is clear now, the screaming face gone. The room is warm and smells of fresh pine-needles.
turns.convergence: The Sentry remains as a small, wooden doll by the fireplace. He's a 'Hearth-Guardian' (+1 Morale).

turns.narrative: The local dwellers offer you a 'Soot-Cloak' (+1 Stealth). It’s made of the same velvety soot, but it’s no longer screaming.
turns.convergence: The cloak is light as air and makes you feel like a shadow in the corner of the eye.

turns.narrative: As you leave, the 'Low-District' feels a little warmer, the chimneys all puffing out steady, white smoke.
turns.convergence: The sun sets, its light making the soot-stained buildings look like jagged obsidian.

turns.narrative: Quest ends in the Low-Ward. The 'Soot-Streaked Window' is now a clear view of home.

conclusion: The mission regarding 'The Soot-Streaked Window' is complete. Quest Complete.

risk_matrix.penalty: You are swept into the Void-Fringe through the chimney. (Quest Failed)
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Low-District residents report screaming soot on windows

permanent_effects.settlement: Rift sealed; Hearth-Guardian installed (+1 Morale passively)
